channel.title: CVE Feed for Liferay -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Liferay -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-25148|2024-08-21T17:33:47.793Z -- liferay -- portal
item.description: In Liferay Portal 7.2.0 through 7.4.1, and older unsupported versions, and Liferay DXP 7.3 before service pack 3, 7.2 before fix pack 15, and older unsupported versions the `doAsUserId` URL parameter may get leaked when creating linked content using the WYSIWYG editor and while impersonating a user. This may allow remote authenticated users to impersonate a user after accessing the linked content.
